actions.text: Amendment SA 1393 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 226.

Amendment SA 1393 proposed by Senator Capito to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6602-6603; text: CR S6603) To help provide tax relief to middle-class Americans by reducing deductibility, for Federal tax purposes, of federal deductions, such as the state and local tax deduction which disproportionally favors high-income individuals.
